species.name: cinccino
descriptions: A special oil that seeps through their fur helps them avoid attacks. The oil fetches a high price at market.
Cinccino’s body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.
Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won’t tolerate even a speck of the stuff.
Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.
The oil that seeps from its body is really smooth. For people troubled by bad skin, this oil is an effective treatment.

abilities.name: cute-charm
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: technician
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

abilities.name: skill-link
abilities.effect: Extends two-to-five-hit moves and triple kick to their full length every time.
